description.value: Convert ALIS43 XML to a Bundle according to the CH ALIS implmementation guide, 2020-12-03 by Oliver Egger, copyright ahdis ag, Apache License, FHIR: http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/. ISSUE7: what are the URL's oid's we have to define.

documentation.value: ISSUE1: should be link to a MessageDefinition or a code?
ISSUE2: MessageControlID cannot be id of entry, needs to be either fullUrl oder uuid, need to map this to an identifier
ISSUE4: " : "urn:ReceivingApplication, ReceivingFacility, ReceivingServiceCode" -> add urn: in example/docu
ISSUE8: what to do with falldomain? <system value="http://www.example.ch/fallnummerdomain"/>
